course.title: MAT 5343 Mathematical Aspects of Wavelets and Digital Signal Processing (3 units)
course.desc: Lossless compression methods. Discrete Fourier transform and Fourier-based compression methods. JPEG and MPEG. Wavelet analysis. Digital filters and discrete wavelet transform. Daubechies wavelets. Wavelet compression. This course is equivalent to MATH 5822 at Carleton University.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: Linear algebra and Fourier series
